dialogo_borrar: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
departureDatetime: Date and time of arrival at destination
returnDatetime: Date and time of return from destination
hotel-area: Hotel area (You can mark it on the map)
massive-insertion-pois: Massive insertion of points of interest
select-file: Select the file with the points of interest you want to insert
dialog-delete-all: Do you want to delete all points of interest?
insert-json-pois: Enter a JSON or a JSON vector with the format of a points of interest
click-coordinates: Coordinates (You can click on the map and the latitude and longitude will be loaded automatically)
time-next-point: Time to get to the next point

points-of-interest-rules.nameRules2: Name must be less than 100 characters
points-of-interest-rules.townRules2: The town of the point of interest may not contain numbers or special characters
points-of-interest-rules.postalCodeRules2: The postal code can only contain numbers

tourists-rules.nameRules2: Name must be less than 100 characters
tourists-rules.nameRules3: The tourist's name may not contain numbers or special characters
tourists-rules.surnameRules2: Surname must be less than 100 characters
tourists-rules.surnameRules3: The tourist's surname may not contain numbers or special characters
tourists-rules.emailRules2: The syntax of the tourist's email isn't correct, the correct syntax is 'username@provider.provider-type'
tourists-rules.emailRules3: The tourist's email address must begin with a letter (a-z, A-Z) or a number (0-9)
tourists-rules.emailRules4: The tourist's email username can't have a consecutive colon
tourists-rules.emailRules5: The tourist's email user name can only contain alphanumeric characters and the '.', '-', '_' signs
tourists-rules.emailRules6: The tourist's email username must be between 6 and 30 characters long
tourists-rules.emailRules7: The tourist's email provider must start with a letter (a-z, A-Z)
tourists-rules.emailRules8: The domain of the tourist's email cannot have two consecutive dots
tourists-rules.emailRules9: The tourist's email provider can only contain alphanumeric characters
tourists-rules.emailRules10: The tourist's email provider must be between 2 and 20 characters long
tourists-rules.emailRules11: The domain of the tourist's email must contain only letters
tourists-rules.emailRules12: The type of the tourist's email provider must be between 2 and 10 characters
tourists-rules.dniRules: The DNI, NIE or passport is obligatory

travels-preferences-rules.budgetRules2: Budget must be greater than or equal to 0
travels-preferences-rules.departureDatetimeRules: The date and time of departure to the destination are obligatories
travels-preferences-rules.returnDatetimeRules1: The date and time of return at the destination are obligatories
travels-preferences-rules.returnDatetimeRules2: There must be a minimum of 1 day between the date of arrival at the destination and the date of return

time-on-poi: Number of hours at the point of interest
